work.name: Princeton Reinforcement Learning Lab
highlights: Developed learned representations for goal-conditioned RL policies to improve generalization to unseen goals in continuous control environments, using both end-to-end training and contrastive learning techniques

work.name: Citi Bank
highlights: Developed and deployed a dashboard for the Cross Product Margin team to seamlessly view and modify historical stress scenario shocks in live production
Designed dynamic user-friendly graphical representation of historical shocks by factor, streamlining users’ data validation process

work.name: Deutsche Bank
highlights: Pitched and defended a high yield bond (CCC+) to senior traders using micro-level analysis of the company’s financials as well as macrotrends in the rising interest rate world
Examined live commercial real estate and securitization deals, conducting return analysis to determine pricing and spreads

awards.title: Tau Beta Pi
awards.awarder: Princeton School of Engineering and Applied Sciences
